title.narrative: Resources to improve food security in Eastern DRC (RISE)

description.narrative: (Democratic Republic of the Congo): Key activities of this program include increasing diverse and disease-resistant agricultural production; improving farmers' interaction with the market; reinforcing proper nutrition and hygiene behavior for mothers and children under two; and building capacity of local and community government structures to address food security issues. By the end of its five-year term, this activity will decrease food insecurity among 410,000 people within vulnerable households in North Kivu in eastern DRC. It will raise the profits of participating farmers by 20 percent, increase farmers' access to credit by developing 120 new Village Savings and Loan Associations, reduce the number of underweight children by 60 percent within targeted households, and increase the number of community members satisfied with government's response to local food insecurity by 30 percent.
